title: Bryce Harper | 2015 MLB National League MVP
description: According to the living legend George Brett, the choice was obvious. We agree.

asset.title: Bryce Harper | 2015 MLB National League MVP
asset.description: According to the living legend George Brett, the choice was obvious. We agree.
asset.author: Under Armour

transcripts: There's no clear-cut definition of what most valuable means, the rules remain the same as they were written in 1931. All players are eligible, and  voters are urged to consider the following, one the actual value of a player to his team, that is strength of our offense and defense. Two the number of games he plays, three his character, his disposition, his loyalty, and effort. In 2015 come on people, the choice was obvious, the scary thing is he's just getting started.
